item.title: Troubleshooting: A valuable skill
item.description: Somewhere in time, you changed a line of code and then your feature or test just broke and you couldn’t manage to trace the problem? Or maybe you’ve installed a plugin and it didn’t work as intended. I’ll bring you some useful tips. There are some scenarios when this skill is valuable and for each, there is a different approach. Let’s put up some: You’re installing that new awesome framework.
